Name: Gary's Deli
Review Text: Location is great; where you can get a good view on people passing by. There is ample of (comfortable) sitting options available in and outside. The decorum lacks character though, it's all very bland/generic. The music selection was great ‚Ä¶

Name: Gary's Deli

Name: Gary's Deli
Review Text: I live nearby and there are plenty of breakfast options. This is easily the best. Food and customer service. Best music as well!

Name: Gary's Deli
Review Text: The American pancakes melt in your mouth! Truly delicious. Breakfast was prepared to perfection. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back as the full menu is very appealing. Cozy, chill atmosphere, great, friendly service.

Name: Gary's Deli
Review Text: By far my favourite place to get bagles in Amsterdam. But now I'm in love with their grilled chicken salad. Fresh and super tasty. Friendly and helpful staff, great coffee, a place to take your friends out

Name: Gary's Deli
Review Text: Really good latte and smoked salmon/cream cheese bagel - reminds me of Montreal style bagels back home - which I love! A busy place, but would come back again!

Name: Gary's Deli
Review Text: Amazing spot for delicious food! Loved my vegan breakfast and iced coffee! Service, food, price and location are all excellent!!! Definitely coming back here

Name: Gary's Deli

Name: Gary's Deli
Review Text: Great atmosphere and friendly staff. The hummus and grilled veggies is my favourite. A large variety of bagles as well.

Name: Gary's Deli
Review Text: Delicious pancakes.

Name: Gary's Deli
Review Text: Great coffee and good service, the food smells good but I just ate so ill stick with coffee

Name: Gary's Deli
Review Text: I'm not sure what happened with Gary's Deli, but in my opinion the quality of both the food and the coffee (and, yes, the service) went down quite a bit from, say, two or three years ago. The place wasn't busy but the staff took its time before even acknowledging customers. The coffee tasted bad and the bagel was stale. What happened?

Name: Gary's Deli
Review Text: Place is a good location, but average with all respects. Pancakes only on a Sunday so was disappointed but they probably are good. Coffee was not great tasting but bagels were great !

Name: Gary's Deli
Review Text: I'm in love with the bagles from Gar'y Deli. Great atmosphere and super friendly staff

Name: Gary's Deli
Review Text: didn't eat here but an employee was dancing. 5 stars.

Name: Gary's Deli
Review Text: Amazing. We wondered in here for a quick lunch and really enjoyed the bagels. Perfectly toasted, plenty of fillings and good cheese used.

Name: Gary's Deli
Review Text: Bagels are ok-ish. dirty cutlery, slow service. the only plus...coffee stays  hot in the cup for quite a while! :)
